page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: Area is in the parish of Thornton in Lonsdale with Burton in Lonsdale in the Diocese of Bradford. Until the church was completed in 1870 there was only a Chapel-of-ease in Burton. The church is very evangelistic and forward - looking and is active in village life. There are 89 on the electoral roll. The Vicar, the Rev. H.M.Kitchen lives at the Vicarage in Low St. He conducts morning service in Burton and afternoon in Thornton. There are Methodist churches in both villages ( Minister - The Rev. Jennifer Lunn ) with congregations drawn mainly from surrounding farms. Young people take an active part in the services. Joint Church of England / Methodist services are held at Christmas.
